root: ^My boss %FullName:NPC:1% asks me if I want to do some training through work tomorrow.
^Say no, I'll just do my normal work.
^I'll do the training to learn how to train others.

res1: ^A lot of other people do the training so I have a lot of work to do, a lot of moving boxes around.

^It's a long day, especially since so many other people did training. I ended up having so much extra work to do. So many boxes had to be moved around and organized and I got to do all of it! Lucky me, right? I am just glad for this long day to be done with.
res2: ^The training goes over how to train other employees and I learn a lot.
^%FullName:NPC:1% is glad I took some training and now I am a certified trainer and can train new employees. The training course was really insightful and I learned a lot. I am ready to teach!
res3: ^The training on management is really interesting and after I finish my boss %FullName:NPC:1% gives me a raise and a promotion.

^My raise kicked in immediately and I earned $30 for doing the training. And my boss %FullName:NPC:1% is proud of me for taking this step. Wow, I am so glad I took this class. Also, it's going to be great to take steps towards management and be able to put that on my resume.
